description:
Security groups are not working with cells using nova-network.
Only cell API database is updated when adding rules. These are not propagated into the children cells.
title: Security-groups not working with cells using nova-network

comments.content:
Security groups are not working with cells using nova-network
Only cell API database is updated when adding rules. These are not propagated into the children cells.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~moreira-belmiro-email-lists

comments.content: Cells doesn't support security group at all right now.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~jogo

comments.content: This is more of a new feature then a bug, so marking as wishlist (that doesn't mean we don't want it)
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~jogo

comments.content: Hi dheeraj, are you still working on this?
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~fifieldt

comments.content:
nova-network is deprecated with the Newton release [1], which means it is unlikely that this gets solved. I'm closing it with "won't fix".

References:
[1] https://github.com/openstack/nova/commit/7d5fc486823117ba7a0a9005142ef87059ef74cd
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~mzoeller
